content: अनुव्रज् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To follow, go after; तां व्रजंतीमनुवव्राज <ls>K. 132</ls>, <ls n="K.">210</ls>; attend especially a departing guest (as far as the bank of water, lake, &c.) as a mark of respect; <ls>Y. 1. 113</ls>; तं मातरो देवमनुव्रजंत्यः <ls>Ku. 7. 38</ls>; यमिच्छेत्पुनरायांतं नैनं दूरमनुव्रजेत् <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} To visit in order, seek. {@--3@} To go to or near; betake oneself to; मृगा मृगैः संगमनुव्रजंति <ls>Pt. 1</ls> deer herd or associate with deer. {@--4@} To obey, to do homage to.
